title: Kona Grill is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA
statement: Kona Grill's website is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA accessibility standards.

citations.quote: Kona Grill is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA. Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard.
